name: ticket
description: A set of commands related to ticket management

options.name: info
options.description: Any additional info you'd like to add

options.name: topic
options.description: The reason for opening a ticket

options.name: topic
options.description: Changes the topic of the current ticket

options.name: add
options.description: Add a user and/or role to the current ticket

options.name: permissions
options.description: The level of permission to give to these users/roles

options.name: member
options.description: The user to add to the current ticket

options.name: role
options.description: The role to add to the current ticket

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a user and/or role from the current ticket

options.name: member
options.description: The user to remove from the current ticket

options.name: role
options.description: The role to remove from the current ticket

options.name: hold
options.description: Places the current ticket on hold

options.name: checksum
options.description: Validate a transcript.log or attachments.zip's legitimacy with its SHA-256 checksum

options.name: transcript
options.description: A transcript.log file from TicketBird's logging

options.name: attachments
options.description: An attachments.zip file from TicketBird's logging
